name: Puzzle 101: Edge of Galaxy 宇宙边际
name_original: Puzzle 101: Edge of Galaxy 宇宙边际
description:
Edge Of Galaxy - very beautiful game of space puzzle! Collect the full image of the different small pieces. You can either play with very relax on Casual mode, or Challenge Mode with time attack, snapping difficulty, adjustable pieces size and others.

Game Features
  • Casual Mode
  • Challenge Mode
  • 80 very beautiful images!
  • Leaderboard!
  • Achievement!
